name: Megalith Arms
description:
Ride in the cockpit of a battle-ready Megalith, a war machine mech equipped with futuristic weaponry as you raze your enemies across an alien world.  Find your way through the enemy's stronghold, from underground tunnels to a pristine science facility.  Your mission: Find a way off-world to rejoin the battle in space.

Your Megalith survived the impact of atmospheric re-entry without a scratch but had to jettison its weaponry in the process.  Unlock machine guns and rocket launchers while you tear into the enemy drones with highly accurate laser cannons.

  • 3 atmospheric zones to traverse.
  • 4 basic enemy types.
  • 2 unique bosses, each with a specific means of defeat.
  • Voice acting for missions, bosses, and pickups.
